titleStmt.title: An excellent historie bothe pithy and pleasant, discoursing on the life and death of Charles and Iulia, two Brittish, or rather Welshe louers No lesse delightfull for varietie, then tragicall in their miserie, not hurtfull to youthe, nor vnprofitable to age, but commodious to bothe. By W.A.
titleStmt.author: Averell, W. (William)

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Charlewood?] for Edward White, dwelling at the little north doore of S. Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Charles and Iulia two Brittaine loouers.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the little north doore of S. Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun
